banner-text-1: Fully customizable timer and countdown for streamers.
banner-text-2: Emphasizes simplicity, creativity, and very low processing power.
about-desc-text: piTime is a single page web-based app that gives you the ability to design and fully customize a timer to your livestream overlay.
about-github-text: You are more than welcome to report errors and bugs, suggest new features or help us translate the project into a new language on the project's GitHub page!
